title: The Magic Flute
brief_description: Ever since its first performance in 1791, Mozart’s “The Magic Flute” has remained a favourite with opera audiences worldwide. Australian born Yvonne Kenny gives a radiant performance as Parina, with the world renowned Richard Bonynge conducting Mozart’s magical score. Featuring the Australian Opera Chorus and the Elizabethan Sydney Orchestra. Sung in English.
